extendedInfo.description: Notice:  This app has recently been upgraded.  Returning users may need to reinstall.Welcome to The Gazette Garage Sales application, your trusted source for finding local garage sales.Hunting down and mapping out routes for garage sales can be time consuming and frustrating:  either outdated information, or no local listings.  But with the Garage Sales application from The Gazette, you can save time by searching current, local ads on the go.  Itâs the easiest and most reliable way to find garage sales near you.Search and Save by keywords, open days and times, and proximity to your location.  View detailed information, even pictures.   Set up alerts to be notified when new garage sales featuring your preferences come up.  Map out your shopping strategy so you can be first to get the good deals.  Make a weekend of treasure hunting in your area, with the Garage Sales application from The Colorado Springs Gazette in hand!Keywords: garage sale, yard sale, rummage sale, tag sale, estate sale, map, mapping, classified, local sale, craigslist, newspaper, shopping, free, finder, craigs list, garagesaleapps, treasure map, flea market,The Gazette, Colorado Springs, Gazette.com

reviews.comment: Need zoom view for map Zip code zones could help too

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Has made going garage saling way easy. Now I don\'t have to drive around aimlessly/search through and look up addressess
